tidbits.title: Biodiversity Hotspot
tidbits.description: Sri Lanka is a biodiversity hotspot with rich flora and fauna, including the Asian elephant, leopards, and a variety of endemic species in its diverse ecosystems.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage seen in ancient sites like Sigiriya, historic cities like Kandy, and a vibrant tradition of dance, music, and festivals.

tidbits.title: Tea Production
tidbits.description: Sri Lanka is one of the world's largest tea producers, renowned for Ceylon tea, offering scenic tea plantations that attract visitors to the hill country.
